About Stiwdio

“Your challenge, our talent.”

Whatever the job brief, we have a degree-certified freelancer on hand to help.

What is the Stiwdio Agency?

Here at the Stiwdio Agency, we seek to unite talented graduates with businesses in need. From video and film production, photography, infographics, web development, brand design, copywriting, sound engineering, and more, our degree-certified professionals are only a few clicks away. Have a browse of our freelancers here Proudly powered by the Startup Stiwdio and the University of South Wales.

Expertise

University of South Wales graduates are prepared for tomorrow, ready to build their careers and make a difference.

Entrepeneurs

USW’s first dedicated incubator space, the Startup Stiwdio nurtures graduate start-ups; we understand the language of freelance and the language of business
